title: L'amour flou
overview: After 10 years of living together, two adored children and a dog, Romane and Philippe have separated. From this unique adventure, they made a film: "L'Amour flou". So here they are installed in this strange life, which in many ways turns out to be miraculous: the threat of separating no longer exists since it is done, the tensions between Philippe and Romane seem to have disappeared and they now speak the language. friendship. Children, on the other hand, seem to be bathed in happiness, with both parents close at hand. But the daily life of the Rebbot-Bohringer family is as crazy and vague as ever.
